participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: creative and nurturing, loves to express herself through art.
participant_1.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: curious and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_2.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body.
